Sunday Review Sessions

Each week, we will post the worksheet and answers for the sunday review sesion held. See Piazza for SRS scheduling.

Date Worksheet Answers
September 13, 2020 Variables, Types, Operators Answer Key
September 20, 2020 Scoping, Loops, Conditonals Answer Key
September 27, 2020 Arrays Answer Key
October 4, 2020 Functions Answer Key
October 11, 2020 Functions and Arrays Review, Recursion Answer Key
October 18, 2020 No SRS this week!
October 25, 2020 Objects Answer Key
November 1, 2020 Objects Answer Key
November 8, 2020 JUnit, Linked Lists Answer Key
November 15, 2020 Number systems, Binary Operators & 2D Arrays Answer Key
November 22, 2020 Open Q&A - No worksheet
